issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Build a "mobile web inspector" that would popup in a window on load and allow developers to show the Ti element tree, inspect individual Ti elements, events, view console output, loaded modules, cache status, Ti.Database browser, Ti.Filesystem browser, Ti.Network traffic, resize window, and search.

This inspector would only be visible when in "development" mode.

For desktop browsers, the inspector would be a separate browser window. For devices, we may choose to not support device debugging, create a bridge to a desktop browser, or use a dialog (which would obscure the view).
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Create a Mobile Web Inspector

comments.body: Closing ticket as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb is no longer supported.
